line.text: Not mine own fears nor the prophetic soul
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of the wide world dreaming on things to come
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Can yet the lease of my true love control
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Supposed as forfeit to a confined doom
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The mortal moon hath her eclipse endured
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And the sad augurs mock their own presage
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And peace proclaims olives of endless age
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Now with the drops of this most balmy time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My love looks fresh and death to me subscribes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Since spite of him Ill live in this poor rhyme
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: While he insults oer dull and speechless tribes
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And thou in this shalt find thy monument
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When tyrants crests and tombs of brass are spent
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
